episodes.synopsis: Ricky Gervais and Stephen Merchant send reluctant traveler Karl Pilkington on a trip to see the Great Wall of China.
episodes.title: China

episodes.synopsis: While in India to see the Taj Mahal, Karl is forced to visit the largest religious festival in the world and stay in an ashram with a living saint.
episodes.title: India

episodes.synopsis: While in Jordan to see Petra, Karl's forced to go on an unexpected tour of the Middle East that includes Israel, Palestine and a dip in the Dead Sea.
episodes.title: Jordan

episodes.synopsis: Karl travels to Mexico, where he pays a visit to Chichen Itza. He also tries his hand at wrestling, learns how to become a cowboy and more.
episodes.title: Mexico

episodes.synopsis: Karl travels to see the Great Pyramids in Egypt, where he dons a traditional Egyptian outfit, experiences Cairo nightlife and hangs out with locals.
episodes.title: Egypt

episodes.synopsis: Karl travels to Brazil to see Christ the Redeemer. While there, he takes part in the Rio Carnival, immerses himself in Rio's gay scene and more.
episodes.title: Brazil

episodes.synopsis: In Peru, Karl is unexpectedly dropped in the middle of the Amazon, where he's forced to survive in the jungle, mix with a local tribe and more.
episodes.title: Peru

episodes.synopsis: Now back in London, Karl is quizzed about his travels by Ricky and Steve, who want to find out if he's actually learned anything from his experiences.
episodes.title: Karl Comes Home

episodes.synopsis: Karl's first "to do" is to spend a night on the island of Vanuatu in the South Pacific, an outing involving bungee jumps, exotic underwear and more.
episodes.title: Desert Island

episodes.synopsis: Karl boards the Trans-Siberian Express, which starts in Russia and goes through Mongolia, ending in China -- which is Karl's most hated place.
episodes.title: Trans-Siberian Express

episodes.synopsis: Karl heads off to Australia to swim with dolphins, but first, Ricky and Steve have a planned a little stopover in Thailand.
episodes.title: Swim with Dolphins

episodes.synopsis: Karl's next thing to do is to go whale watching in Alaska, where Ricky and Steve have also planned some dog sledding, a meeting with Inuits and more.
episodes.title: Whale Watching

episodes.synopsis: Karl heads off to Africa to meet a gorilla. But before he travels to Uganda, he agrees to start in South Africa.
episodes.title: Meet a Gorilla

episodes.synopsis: Karl wants to drive along the legendary Route 66 in the United States in an open-top Cadillac, but Ricky and Steve have other ideas.
episodes.title: Route 66

episodes.synopsis: Karl's last thing to do is seeing -- and climbing -- Japan's most spiritual destination: Mount Fuji. But on arrival in Japan, he gets lost in Tokyo.
episodes.title: Climb Mount Fuji

episodes.synopsis: Now back in London, Karl is quizzed about his travels by Ricky and Steve, who want to find out if he's actually learned anything from his experiences.
episodes.title: Karl Comes Home

episodes.synopsis: Karl and Warwick start their journey in Venice, Italy, where Marco Polo began the same trip 800 years before.
episodes.title: The Short Way Around: Venice

episodes.synopsis: Karl and Warwick continue their journey via India, where they stop off in Mumbai.
episodes.title: The Short Way Around: India

episodes.synopsis: Karl goes to see the Spider Sisters perform and soon hatches a plan to get a reluctant Warwick on stage with them to help them earn more money.
episodes.title: India to Hong Kong: The Short Way Around: China

video.title: An Idiot Abroad
video.synopsis: In a twist on the travelogue genre, comedian Ricky Gervais sends his "idiot" friend Karl Pilkington to a series of exotic locales around the world.
